.TourDates p {

}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;

    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;

    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;

}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {

}

<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Helicopter Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/kashmir-tour-packages" title="kashmir Tour Packages">Kashmir</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter</span></span></p>

<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c3212e1edb1_87598000" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">

<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/vaishno-devi-yatra-by-helicopter.jpg" alt="Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter" title="Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"> </div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<h3><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview </h3>
<p>Settled on Trikuta Hills at an altitude of 5200ft Mata Vaishno Devi Temple is the most visited pilgrimage of Hindus. The shrine is situated in a holy cave on the Shivalik Mountain Range where pilgrims can do the philosophy of Mata Vaishno throughout the year. This pilgrimage is a perfect combination of holy atmosphere accompanied with natural beauty where one can enjoy well.</p>
<p>The pilgrimage is based on the Darshans of three Pindies i.e. Maha Kali, Maha Lakshmi and Maha Saraswati but there are some other places also where one can do the philosophy and get the blessings for their prosperity. Pilgrims can avail the facilities of Mule and Pony rides if they are not well health. Namaste India Trip provides Mata Vaishno Devi Package clubbed with many facilities like we offer you the helicopter rides to make your journey more comfortable and that also at an affordable price.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter Tour Itinerary</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Jammu - Sanji Chatti - Vaishno Devi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Jammu airport is the starting and concluding point of the yatra. Upon arrival at the airport, early in the morning, you will be greeted by our tour representative. After the security clearance, you will be taken to the waiting lounge. The passengers will then be transferred to the helicopter that will fly them to the Sanji Chatt Helipad, which is the helipad designated for Vaishno Devi Yatra.</p>
<p>On arriving at Sanjichat a guide will take you to the Bhawan by walking which will take about half an hour to cover and is 2.5 kms away from the helipad. There are Palki/Doli and even the newly introduced ropeway services also available to cover the distance if the passengers do not wish to walk the route.</p>
<p>Vaishno Devi is a very powerful and important Shaktipeeth that does not contain any pictures or idols of the goddess since the entire cave is very holy and worshipped by Devi worshippers.</p>
<p>After offering Darshan every passenger will be guided back to the Sanji Chatt Helipad from where they will be taking the helicopter back to Jammu airport. On reaching back to the Jammu airport, the passengers will be taken to the airport waiting for a lounge that will be marking the end of the one-day <strong>Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter</strong>.</p>
<p>The passengers will then be free to head on to the destination of their choice. This will be marking the end of the <strong>Vaishno Devi Helicopter Yatra Package</strong>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What is the duration of the helicopter ride from Sanji chatti to the shrine?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The flight duration lasts 20 minutes from the sanjichhat helipad. </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which is the best time to visit Vaishno devi yatra?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> March to October is the best time to go for Vaishno devi yatra.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What is the timing for helicopter service in Vaishno devi?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The helicopter service for vaishno devi starts from 7:30 am and goes on till 8:00 to 8:00 pm.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is a helicopter ride in vaishno devi safe to travel with kids?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><strong>A.</strong> Yes. The helicopter trip to Vaishno devi is completely safe.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How to do offline helicopter ticket booking for Vaishno devi?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> You can book a helicopter ticket for Vaishno devi from the current heli-ticket counters present at Katra or sanjichat by presenting valid ID proof and other documentation.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Helicopter Tour Package Home » India » Kashmir » Vaishno Devi Yatra by Helicopter Tour Overview Settled on Trikuta Hills at an altitude of 5200ft Mata Vaishno Devi Temple is the most visited pilgrimage of Hindus. The shrine is situated in a holy cave on the Shivalik Mountain Range where pilgrims...
